we were discussing on another sword list about the shinsa paper.
Specifical=
ly the paper on mumei fittings that passed.
Quite often, we get the passing=
 origami attributing the piece to just " 
Kyo kinko ".
A suggestion if I ma=
y............. how about the shinsa team be a 
little bit more specific in =
the attribution ( mumei fittings ), say for 
example " kyo kinko in the sty=
le of so and so  ", rather than just Kyo 
kinko ?
This would help the colle=
ctors in further study, yes ?

Milt
